quest.manual: 唤醒帐篷中沉睡的昆昆部族咒术师

quest.name: 心态年轻
quest.desc: $npc:11000744$是童话中在树林村庄里倾听愿望，制作愿望之汤的树林魔女。 她熬了很久的汤，过于专注的$npc:11000744$因为太饿了，一边想象着好吃的食物，一边尝了尝汤的味道后就来到了$map:02000185$。 但是，$npc:11000744$现在自己在哪里做什么都不重要！跟着甜甜的味道，寻找能够补充$npc:11000744$糖分的甜味食物吧！

quest.name: Back in Time
quest.desc: $npc:11000984$ from the Andersen Village arrived in $map:02000185$ after messing up the incantation which resulted in the wrong door of time opening. In order to open the door that leads to the town of fairy tales, $npc:11000984$ needs $item:30000301$, which was taken by $npc:21000278$. It's time to hunt $npc:21000278$ and take the $item:30000301$ back.

quest.name: A Bold Move
quest.desc: $npc:11000984$ is ready to go back to the Andersen Village, but $npc:11000984$'s friends morphed into violent monsters after warping through the distortion of time and space. $npc:11000984$ feels responsible for this turn of events, and doesn't want to go back without fixing this. For the safety of the Andersen Village and $map:02000185$, let's defeat $npc:21000278$, $npc:21000173$, and $npc:21000160$.

quest.name: 谜之研究
quest.desc: $map:02000023$的$npc:11000985$一直都在研究人工智能机器人。不久前，在漫长的研究结束后，人工智能机器人$npc:21000241$终于诞生了，但是结果却不尽人意。 为了净化和管理$map:02000023$而创造的$npc:21000241$正在破坏树木。 不知道程序中哪里出了错误，但现在必须马上破坏$npc:21000241$。 破坏设计错误的机器人$npc:21000241$。
quest.manual: 破坏设计错误的机器人$npc:21000241$。

quest.name: 永不放弃
quest.desc: $npc:11000985$说， 他不能就这么放弃花费一生来研究的$npc:21000241$，无论如何他都要找到错误的原因。 他需要马上回到研究所分析错误数据，希望能帮他把临时研究所中安装的中央处理装置数据复制给他。 到$map:02000128$的$npcName:11000985$研究室中，把$npc:11000985$给的$item:30000302$放入中央处理装置，复制这段时间的所有数据。

quest.name: 丢失的诞生石
quest.desc: $npc:11000986$把去世父亲留给自己的最重要的诞生石弄丢了，十分伤心。 为了在困难时帮助自己的朋友，打算把诞生石加工做成项链送给他，但附近的怪物看到闪闪发光的石头，就把原石抢走了。 从$npc:21000052$、$npc:21000004$那里找回被抢走的$npc:11000986$的珍贵诞生石。

quest.name: 介绍我的朋友
quest.desc: $npc:11000986$为了感谢我找回诞生石，说要将自己最大的恩人和兄弟，同时也是珍贵的朋友介绍给我。 他们就是在魔法密林被遗忘的波波洛矮人！ 究竟波波洛因为什么在哪里怎么样生活的，去他们的世界看看吧！ $map:02000128$顶端的$map:02000197$究竟是什么地方呢？

quest.name: 小而忙碌
quest.desc: 在$map:02000197$见到了波波洛爷爷 $npcName:11000987$。转达了$npc:11000986$的问候，他立刻就放松了警戒。 $npcName:11000987$犹豫要不要说出波波洛矮人的秘密，突然想到了在这个重要的时候，波波洛们还在睡午觉。 $npcName:11000987$委托我去叫醒睡午觉的波波洛。

quest.name: 监视塔的不速之客
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$独自守卫着$map:02000091$。体力和精神都快达到极限的$npc:11000959$说自己无法再坚持下去了，请求我的帮助。 帮助$npc:11000959$消灭威胁监视塔的$npc:21000265$、$npc:21000306$、。

quest.name: S.O.S
quest.desc: 靠近监视塔入口的怪物数量大大减少了。但是，$npc:11000959$说，不知道什么时候又会有新的威胁，所以不能就此放心。为了守护受到威胁的$map:02000091$，需要援兵。 放飞$map:02000091$城墙上的信鸽，请求大本营的队员前来援助。
quest.manual: 放飞信鸽，向队员寻求帮助

quest.name: My Precious Chickens
quest.desc: Will be added
quest.manual: Safely put the premium chickens grazing in the field to the poultry farm

quest.name: Sticky Situation
quest.desc: From the corner of $map:02000196$ in $map:02000091$, a girl screams in horror. She says her name is $npc:11000960$, and the reason she let out such a bloodcurdling scream...is because toilet paper is nowhere to be found. ...It looks like she didn't check if there was any $item:30000313$ before taking care of business. Let's show some sympathy and go through the emergency aid box to find $item:30000313$ for $npc:11000960$, who is in quite a sticky situation.
quest.manual: Go through the emergency aid box to find $item:30000313$

quest.name: First Contact
quest.desc: You place the $item:30000313$ through the crack in the door, but $npc:11000960$ lets out another ear-piercing scream as soon as you turn around. It turns out she can't reach the $item:30000313$ from where she is sitting... At the end of her rope, $npc:11000960$ asks you to come in to the $map:02000196$... Could this situation get any worse...

quest.name: Battle for Bowels
quest.desc: $npc:11000960$ confesses that she is currently suffering from...ahem...chronic constipation. She claims that consuming the $npc:21000353$ extract will relieve her from this painful condition. Let's hunt $npc:21000353$ to relieve $npc:11000960$ from such a painful condition.

quest.name: 泼出去的水
quest.desc: $npc:11000746$开玩笑说如果拿来世界树种子，就能制作出改变外表的药。对外表不自信的洛洛却信以为真。为了获得世界树种子，洛洛让森林中的巨人姆姆斯戴上了洗脑面具，结果巨人正在将$map:02000103$变得一片混乱。 如果不制服变得越来越狂暴的$npc:23000035$ ，$map:02000023$的心脏--世界树种子可能真的会被抢走。 制伏$npc:23000035$，将姆姆斯戴着的$item:30000329$拿来。
quest.manual: （首领）制伏$npc:23000035$，将姆姆斯戴着的$item:30000329$拿来

quest.name: 不详的水滴
quest.desc: 森林妖精$npc:11000876$为了冷静头脑，去听红点瓢虫唱歌，却在$map:02000215$看到了可怕的事情--在树林中到处都是紫色水滴。更可怕的是，森林的朋友--红点瓢虫被不详的水滴污染，变成了紫色。 $npc:11000876$说，这样下去，整个$map:02000215$都会变得奇怪，请我消灭污染森林的罪魁祸首。 消灭$map:02000215$的$npc:21090176$、$npc:21090177$、$npc:21090175$。

quest.name: 你从哪里来？
quest.desc: 童话里安德森王宫的君主$npcName:11001016$在魔法师的帮助下做了时间旅行，来到了冒险岛世界。 到达$map:02000181$的$npcName:11001016$，打算在新的地方建立自己的王宫，正在四处查看，发现城市周围都是怪物。虽然装饰王宫很重要，但似乎先把怪物消灭掉才行。 消灭$map:02000181$周围的$npc:21000220$、$npc:21000222$、$npc:21000266$。

quest.name: Rebellion of the Heretics
quest.desc: $npc:11001053$ taught fighting skills to the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers, who were often ridiculed for their appearance. Unfortunately, the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers are abusing their skills to harass other innocent beings. Although $npc:11001053$ knows that's unacceptable, $npc:11001053$ still feels attached to the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers and would prefer having you do the job. I suppose it's up to me to defeat $npc:21000312$, $npc:21000311$, and $npc:21000310$ occupying $map:02000093$.
quest.manual: Hunt the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers occupying $map:02000093$

quest.name: Innocence Lost
quest.desc: $npc:11001052$ is trying to catch Little Croix, one of the Demon King's underlings. $npc:11001052$ rushed to $map:02000259$ after hearing that Croix was there, but it was too late... Croix was long gone after casting the spirit of the demon to the toys, thereby turning them into monsters. $npc:11001052$ says that in order to find Little Croix, items that belong to the toy monsters imbued with the spirit of Croix are required. I have to hunt $npc:21000279$, $npc:21000168$, and $npc:21000195$ in $map:02000259$, and acquire $item:30000359$, $item:30000360$, and $item:30000361$!
quest.manual: Hunt $npc:21000279$ to acquire $item:30000359$|Hunt $npc:21000168$ to acquire $item:30000360$|Hunt $npc:21000195$ to acquire $item:30000361$

quest.name: Money and Honor
quest.desc: Some of the researchers from the $map:02000269$ ran away with the data containing an important technical document. $npc:11001033$ thinks they simply got tired of conducting the same research all day, and are planning to sell the technology to an unknown organization in $map:02000100$. But what $npc:11001033$ was most appalled by is the fact that they sprayed the sleeping gas that was developed to be equipped on weapons. Fortunately, the effects of the weren't life-threatening to the researchers. Let's wake up the researchers who fell asleep because of the gas, and send them to a safe place.
quest.manual: Wake up the researchers who fell asleep because of the sleeping gas

quest.name: The Bunny and the Moon
quest.desc: $npc:11000885$ was chasing the halo around the moon with friends in an attempt to travel through time, and somehow ended up in $map:02000280$. $npcName:11000885$'s friends got hungry and ate some carrots they found on the field...but that turned them into monstrous bunnies. Who knew carrots could be so dangerous? Let's defeat $npc:21090189$, $npc:21090187$, and $npc:21090188$, who all turned into monsters because of the curse.
quest.manual: Defeat the monster bunnies who became zombies due to the curse of time

quest.name: Will be added
quest.desc: Script will be added later

quest.name: Isolated Agent
quest.desc: $npc:11001040$ from the marine exploratory base HQ got stuck in this place while investigating the mountain peak that suddenly froze when the dimensional rift of Ludibrium was twisted. $npc:11001040$ seems to be the only survivor in $map:02000260$, as all of the other researchers either disappeared in the snow, or lost their lives due to the monsters' attack. Let's defeat $npc:21000002$, $npc:21000199$, and $npc:21000089$, who are all blocking the way, so that $npcName:11001040$ can safely escape $map:02000260$.

quest.name: Mysterious Screams
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001041$ is looking pretty ragged. She says she's been kept up the last few nights by the echoes of children crying, madmen screaming, and animals howling. To make things work, prehistoric monsters have started showing up in the nearby fields.
$npcName:11001041$ is certain this is no coincidence, and wants you to bring her $itemPlural:30000345$, $itemPlural:30000346$, and $itemPlural:30000344$ to aid in her divinations.
quest.manual: Destroy icebergs to get $itemPlural:30000344$ |Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000199$ for $itemPlural:30000345$ |Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000089$ for $itemPlural:30000346$

quest.name: A Piercing Wind
quest.desc:
After her divination, $npcName:11001041$ is petrified with fear. She received visions of ancient $npcNamePlural:21000199$ and $npcNamePlural:21000089$ gathering to awaken $npcName:23000026$, an terrible demon who was defeated by the Sages. If the demon awakens, $map:02000260$ will surely be engulfed in icy darkness.
Defeat $npcName:23000026$ and avert this terrible prophecy.

quest.name: Will be added
quest.desc: Script will be added later

quest.name: Christmas Clothes
quest.desc: $npc:11001044$ delivers Christmas presents to children all over Maple World every year. One day, $npc:11001044$ went to take a relaxing bath only to find out that monsters stole all of $item:30000348$ and $item:30000349$ upon his return. Let's go to $map:02000261$ to reclaim Papa Santa's items that were stolen by $npc:21000227$ and $npc:21000263$.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02000261$ to reclaim $item:30000348$ from the monsters|Go to $map:02000261$ to reclaim $item:30000349$ from the monsters

quest.name: Shocking Development
quest.desc: $npc:11001045$ was dispatched to fix the utility pole that was letting out sparks in $map:02000276$. $npc:11001045$ found out that the electric current is much stronger than expected, and is worried about not being able to check all of the utility poles before all of the electricity leaks out. I'll have to find the high-voltage electrical wire and disconnect it to help $npc:11001045$.

quest.name: Research Gone Wrong
quest.desc: A long time ago, Dr. Kernel discovered that magnetic energy and electricity are combined, immense power can be drawn out. Wanting to find out just how powerful this energy can be, Dr. Kernel performed an experiment that was considered extremely controversial on a wild bear. But this experiment went awry, and $npc:22000023$ the electrical bear was created. No one was able to control this vicious bear, and it not only injured Dr. Kernel, but also destroyed the entirety of $map:02000276$. I must defeat $npc:22000023$ that is putting $map:02000276$ in great peril.

quest.name: Listen to Me...Or Else
quest.desc: $npc:11001047$ is not very happy about how the reformation project of the Goldus Industrial Development Institute is going. Despite its objective of trying to provide jobs for criminals and hoodlums instead of sending them to jail, these ungrateful delinquents don't care about jobs and are slacking off all day. $npc:11001047$ request that I teach them a lesson so that they can get back to work.

quest.name: Shrouded in Darkness
quest.desc: As most unicorns have disappeared after getting possessed by demonic spirits, only a handful of unicorns remain. They've been hiding in $map:02000192$ as they attempt to recover their magical power. Despite their efforts, they've been getting weaker ever since the Kwinko Grave Robbers have begun occupying $map:02000192$. A unicorn named $npc:11001058$ is asking if you can get the $item:30000352$ back, as the unicorns cannot regain their power without it. I'll have to defeat $npc:21091023$, $npc:21000110$, and $npc:21091021$ to reclaim the $item:30000352$.
quest.manual: Reclaim the stolen $item:30000352$ from the monsters in $map:02000192$

quest.name: This Little Light of Mine
quest.desc: Now that $npc:11001058$ has the $item:30000352$, there's one last thing to do before the unicorns can regain their lost power. $npc:11001058$ says if I light up the extinguished beacon crystal, they will then be able to receive the regenerative energy from the crystal. Let's light up the extinguished beacon crystal in $map:02000192$.
quest.manual: Light up the extinguished beacon crystal in $map:02000192$

quest.name: Everlasting Childhood
quest.desc: Living in the space of suspended time, $npc:11000783$ is unbelievably bored, as every day feels the same. $npc:11000783$ now understands why his girlfriend Korin left this place to become an adult. $npc:11000783$ asked you if you could help him get $item:30000378$, so that he too can become an adult... and maybe find Korin one day as well. Let's hunt $npc:21000163$, $npc:21000171$, and $npc:21000194$ in $map:02000262$ to acquire $item:30000378$.

quest.name: 敌我之分
quest.desc: 黑暗之地的卡卡林通过黑金市的一个掮客获得了关于$item:30000353$的信息，并袭击了$map:02000273$。记录了事件现场的机器人$npc:11000850$在储存事件信息时，因为能量枯竭，停止了运转。根据在$npc:11000850$的系统初始化前最后的记录，找到能量储存胶囊中保管的$item:30000353$吧。
quest.manual: 找到能量储存胶囊中保管的$item:30000353$

quest.name: Beloved Brother
quest.desc: $npc:11001076$ is part of the Snowfolk, and is the younger brother of $npcName:11000018$, the weapon seller in $map:02000051$. To meet his brother, he decided to leave his hometown and venture into $map:02000051$. On his way to $map:02000051$, $npc:11001076$ heard about $item:30000351$, a highly valuable and expensive material for a weapon. It can be found in $map:02000011$, but Snowfolk like $npc:11001076$ won't be able to endure the hot temperature. I'll have to acquire $item:30000351$ for $npc:11001076$.
quest.manual: Find the red rock in $map:02000011$ and acquire $item:30000351$

quest.name: Typical Masterminds
quest.desc: $npc:11000837$ noticed the greedy Kwinko Grave Robbers were acting suspicious, and decided to track them. The Kwinko Grave Robbers arrived in $map:02000176$, which is one of the ancient ruins managed by the Ereve Royal Court. $npc:11000837$ is determined to reveal all of their schemes once and for all. $npc:11000837$ request that I defeat $npc:21091022$, $npc:21091024$, and $npc:21091094$, to stop them from stealing the relics while $npc:11000837$ goes for the leader of the Kwinko Grave Robbers.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters trying to steal relics in $map:02000176$

quest.name: Believe It or Not
quest.desc: Getting tired of going through the same routine every day, $npc:11001059$ went fishing to relieve some stress. $npc:11001059$ dozed off while fishing, however, and somehow woke up in $map:02000263$. But because $npc:11001059$ enjoys ice fishing so much, $npc:11001059$ isn't questioning how it happened, or isn't even trying to get back home. ...Despite that, $npc:11001059$ asked me to kick out $npc:21091024$ and $npc:21091022$ disturbing the otherwise peaceful and quiet fishing grounds.

quest.name: Midlife Crisis
quest.desc: $npc:11001059$ is really getting into ice fishing! But $npc:11001059$ still isn't used to the cold weather in $map:02000263$. It's plainly obvious it's going to take a while to catch some big fish. $npc:11001059$ is asking if I could help him make a fire around the fishing area. $npc:11001059$ also needs $item:30000358$, which could be used as bait.
quest.manual: Acquire $item:30000354$ to make a fire|Catch $item:30000358$ to be used as fishing bait

quest.name: Plotting Schemes
quest.desc: Arguing that the archaic research methods and just plain stubbornness are getting in the way of technological development, $npc:11000848$ wants to release the technology containing all the crucial information collected over the years...in exchange for obscene amounts of money. $npc:11000848$ wants me to collect the core energy sources that have been planted inside the monsters in the center. Let's defeat $npc:21000296$, $npc:21000248$, and $npc:21000110$ in $map:02000274$, and collect $item:30000355$ and $item:30000356$.
quest.manual: Hunt monsters in $map:02000274$ to collect $item:30000355$|Hunt monsters in $map:02000274$ to collect $item:30000356$

quest.name: 请原谅我
quest.desc: $npc:11001077$说在某个月圆之夜，自已也不知怎么，就哼起了唤醒魔王的手下三头犬时三头犬的歌曲。结果$map:02000044$中沉睡的三头犬 $npc:23000045$醒了过来，因为自己的失误造成了巨大的灾难，$npc:11001077$陷入了深深的自责中。 为了减轻$npc:11001077$心中的罪恶感，消灭$map:02000044$中醒来的凶恶三头犬 $npc:23000045$！

quest.name: (Dungeon) Piece of Cake
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20014002$ (Entrance: $map:02000011$) Party Size: 10 The quest is only available in challenge mode.
By imperial decree, any prisoner who defeats $npcName:23100011$ 50 or more times in $map:02000311$ will be granted a special pardon. $npcName:11001079$ wants to take advantage of this opportunity, but he's getting cold feat about facing $npcName:23100011$. Perhaps you can go in his place.

quest.name: 请阻止我的女儿
quest.desc: 生活在$map:02000167$的$npc:11001115$。她的独生女$npc:11001116$什么都不做，每天就在被污染的庭院周围转悠，担心这个担心那个。 $npc:11001115$让我去见$npc:11001116$，转告她让她回家。

quest.name: 心痛的理由
quest.desc: $npc:11001116$从卖种子的老奶奶那里获得了红色郁金香的种子，种在了庭院里，但是和自己的想象不同，种子中诞生了凶残的怪物。$npc:11001116$认为这一切都是自己的错，所以不敢回家。 消灭$map:02000328$的$npc:24001101$、$npc:24001102$吧！

quest.name: 被污染的庭院
quest.desc: $map:02000328$恢复了原来的美丽样子后，$map:02000167$的人们再次来到了庭院。但是，随着时间流逝，庭院的植物再次失去了生气并被污染，$npc:11001116$又开始伤心了。 $npc:11001116$怀疑庭院中出现了巨大的掉落的花$npc:24001103$。 再次前往$map:02000328$，消灭$npc:24001103$吧。

quest.name: 陷入危险的环境
quest.desc: $npc:11001140$说，在$map:02000110$各个地方放置的煤气罐因为周围的$npc:21000281$投掷的炸弹，有爆炸的危险。 检查煤气罐，为了不让煤气泄露，关紧阀门。
quest.manual: 检查$map:02000110$中有可能爆炸的煤气罐

quest.name: 充满冒险和神秘的地方！
quest.desc: $npc:11000471$说，不久前在$map:02000136$见到了奇怪的景象。在这附近转悠时，发现闪着蓝光的帽子会突然出现，就像是通往新的空间的大门。虽然在弄清楚究竟这是什么之前，不能随便进入，但是肯定充满了神秘和有趣的东西。$npc:11000471$说如果蓝光帽子再次出现，让我一定要进去看一看。 去看看那里究竟是什么地方吧！
quest.manual: 去蓝光帽子里面的世界探险

quest.name: The Green Menace
quest.desc: $npcName:11001328$ has a grudge against the turtles of $map:02010043$ ever since they spooked his salamander mount. He's asked you to do something about the $npcNamePlural:21000143$, $npcNamePlural:21000144$, and $npcNamePlural:21000145$ so that they never terrorize a poor, defenseless salamander ever again.

quest.name: A Daring Theft
quest.desc:
Last night, a gang of $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ busted into $npcName:11001350$'s vacation home and stole a bunch of $itemPlural:30000451$.
$npcName:11001329$, who is supposed to be watching the home, is in a panic. See if you can help reclaim the stolen goods.
quest.manual: Reclaim $itemPlural:30000451$ stolen by the monsters in $map:02010084$

quest.name: Mr. Arthur's Day Out
quest.desc: $npcName:11001330$ is drowning his sorrows in cheeseburgers, but no amount of ground beef can solve his marital troubles. Find out if there's any way you can help.

quest.name: Mrs. Arthur's Day Out
quest.desc: After a hard day's shopping, $npcName:11001331$ was rewarded by having all of her new items stolen by monsters! She refuses to go home until she gets everything back. Hunt the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ around $map:02010010$ and retrieve her $itemPlural:30000452$.

quest.name: A Mall in Crisis
quest.desc: $npcName:11001332$, president of the $map:02010010$ Merchant Union, is overwhelmed by customer complaints. It seems that rampaging monsters are bad for business. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ that have attacked $map:02010010$.

quest.name: Addicted to Coconade
quest.desc: $npcName:11001333$'s pet $npcName:11001334$ is throwing a tantrum because he wants to drink $item:30000453$. You know just how to handle a tantrum: give him whatever he wants until he shuts up.
quest.manual: Get $item:30000453$ from the vending machine in $map:02010010$

quest.name: Laziness Is a Virtue
quest.desc: $npcName:11001335$ wants to return the skateboard he rented, but the shop is just too far, see? Now that it's past due, he's looking for someone to return it to $npcName:11001336$. Are you that someone?

quest.name: Late Fees
quest.desc: $npcName:11001336$ asked you to collect the abandoned rental skateboards scattered around $map:02010014$.

quest.name: The Thieving Swarm
quest.desc: $npcName:11001336$ is in utter shock after a swarm of bugs stole all of his $itemPlural:30000458$. Find the $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ in $map:02010014$ and get the stolen goods back.

quest.name: Bugging Out
quest.desc: $npcName:11001340$ in $map:02010014$ is having insect troubles at his food truck. Get rid of the $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ swarming the area.
quest.manual: Get rid of the bugs attacking $map:02010014$

quest.name: A Call for Help
quest.desc: $npcName:11001341$ was dispatched to $map:02010014$ to make war on the bugs there, but he was quickly overwhelmed. Find $npcName:11001342$ in $map:02010019$ and ask for backup.

quest.name: Like Rats in a Trap
quest.desc: $npcName:11001344$ has come to $map:02010019$ in search of escapees from Alikar Prison. With his keen guarding skills and your ability to look under beds and in closets, you'll recapture the inmates in no time.

quest.name: Impostors
quest.desc: $npcName:11001370$ claims that monsters have disguised themselves as repairmen and broken into $map:02010009$. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$.

quest.name: Safety First
quest.desc: $npcName:11001370$ is worried about the real repairmen who were trapped in $map:52010009$. Help get them to safety.

quest.name: Precious Gifts
quest.desc: $npcName:11001373$ is on the verge of tears because all the gifts she bought for her family were stolen by monsters during the evacuation. Hunt down $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$ in $map:02010009$ to get the $itemPlural:30000479$ back.

quest.name: Quality Television
quest.desc: Reality television! That's the future! $npcName:11001376$ is going to hit the big time with real live footage of the chaos at $map:02010020$. Gather the $itemPlural:30000482$ for him.

quest.name: Fair and Square
quest.desc: $npcName:11001377$ is suspicious of the results of the latest match. Collect the $item:30000483$ from $map:52010010$ to help assuage—or confirm—her fears.

quest.name: 副本 ：消失的游客
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25009001$ (入口地图：$map:02010023$)
$npc:11001399$最近忙着调查在$map:02010023$发现的金字塔。那么长时间没有被发现的金字塔，在不久前沙漠出现巨大沙尘暴之后被发现的。为了调查该金字塔派了侦察兵，但是过了好几天也没有任何消息。看来里面还是出了什么事情。 进入$map:02010070$内部，确认失踪的侦察兵情况。
quest.manual: 进入$map:02010070$内部，确认失踪的侦察兵的情况。

quest.name: 副本 ：贪婪尽头
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25009001$ (入口地图：$map:02010023$)
$npc:11001399$说总部已经说明了关于$map:02010070$的危险性，但来到遗迹的游客当中还是有人听到幻影的回音。 $npc:11001314$告诉他，如果想完全封印$npc:24001904$，需要找到$npc:24001904$的遗物，并送他往生。 前往$map:02010070$消灭$npc:24001904$，找到$item:30000495$。

quest.name: 副本 ：脱轨列车
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21015001$ (入口地图：$map:02010009$) 建议组队(4人) 只能在普通模式下执行任务。
$npc:11001458$说自己在乘坐黑洛夫号的时候，因火车突然改变了线路而掉了下来。$npcName:11001458$说火车只会在鲁德利列车站那里停一次车，拜托我趁这个机会搭乘黑洛夫号，看看情况如何。
quest.manual: 乘坐黑洛夫号，掌握情况

quest.name: 副本 ：对话结束
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21015001$ (入口地图：$map:02010009$) 建议组队(4人) 只能在普通模式下执行任务。
曾经劫持黑洛夫号的怪人又袭击了黑洛夫号。$npc:11001458$说居然连续两次盯上了黑洛夫号，这完全是在无视黑星会，对此他非常生气。 $npcName:11001458$要求从当时在黑洛夫号被抓的组织成员那里打听关于那群怪人头目的情报，然后去消灭$npc:24001508$、$npcName:24001506$、$npcName:24001507$。

quest.name: 莫名的不祥
quest.desc: 在纳兹卡尔中央大厅见到了$npc:11001473$，他说自己的同伴$npcName:11001474$进入纳兹卡尔神殿内部调查已经半天了还没回来，他很担心。 $npcName:11001473$说在天黑之前必须回去，请我进入纳兹卡尔找到$npcName:11001474$ ，让他赶紧回来。

quest.name: 副本 ：唤醒黑暗的人
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20016002$ (入口地图：$map:02010030$) 建议组队 (10人)
在$map:02010030$见到了$npc:11001474$，他害怕得瑟瑟发抖。他说看到了不知名的巨大阴影进入了$map:02010051$。 $npcName:11001474$觉得那里肯定发生了什么不寻常的事情，希望我去$map:02010051$调查那个阴影的身份。
quest.manual: 进入$map:02010030$内部， 查看黑色阴影的身份

quest.name: 珍贵的航海日志
quest.desc: $npc:11000444$在航海的途中突然遇到了原因不明的暴风雨，被吹到了$map:02000062$。 他在10年时间里记录下来的珍贵的航海日志可能会被水冲走。 他的腿受了伤。帮他到$map:02000062$海边把$item:30000150$拿回来吧。

quest.name: 航海的必要条件
quest.desc: 因为暴风雨，$npc:11000444$失去了所有的财产，连$item:30000151$也弄丢了。 看着他哭得那么伤心，到$map:02000068$去见见$npc:11000019$，问问能不能重新领取$item:30000151$。 $map:02000068$就在$map:02000062$。

quest.name: The New World
quest.desc: Apparently, $npc:11000019$ is a huge fan of $npc:11000444$. Let's take $item:30000151$ to $npcName:11000444$, and let $npcName:11000444$ know that $item:30000151$ can be taken from $npc:11000019$'s drawer at $npc:11000019$ anytime.

quest.name: The Forgotten Incident
quest.desc: After taking out a scrapbook consisting of articles relating to Dr. Kartronic, $map:02000145$'s $npc:11000372$ asked me to help $npc:11001032$, who is currently investigating Dr. Kartronic's most recent project...the MK Project. Is $npc:23000054$ really related to the MK Project?

quest.name: Private Project
quest.desc: While looking over $item:39000005$, $map:02000187$'s $npc:11001032$ tried his best to remember every single detail. Wondering where the necessary clues could be found, he said that looking over the robots in $map:02000187$ might help in finding $item:39000006$. Let's go look at the robots as he suggested.

quest.name: Doctor's Den
quest.desc: After closely examining $item:39000006$, $map:02000187$'s $npc:11001032$ was certain that $map:02000232$ will help figure out why the MK Project failed. But in order to enter, more information is still needed. $npc:11001032$ asked me to investigate the computers in $map:02000187$ and bring $item:30000357$.

quest.name: Valuable Rubble
quest.desc: $npc:11000135$ at $map:02000044$ heard that the rare $item:30000055$ can be found at $map:02000235$. $npc:11000135$ also said that it's a pretty expensive and valuable item, and asked me to acquire some.

quest.name: Ancient Relic
quest.desc: After finding $item:30000056$ mixed inside $item:30000055$, $npc:11000135$ began violently trembling in fear. When I asked him what was wrong, all $npc:11000135$ told me was to take it to $npc:11000039$.

quest.name: In Search of Vayar
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$ said that $item:30000056$ can be used to locate the Stone Giants spread out across the world. However, $npc:23100006$, the strongest (and most evil) one of them all, cannot be tracked down accurately. Sharper than a blade, and colder than the harshest winter! The salty scent of the ocean, penetrating both the nostrils and lungs! Let's carefully consider these clues from $npc:11000039$, and look for any traces of $npc:23100006$.

quest.name: Foretold
quest.desc:
You spoke with $npc:11000144$ at $map:02000173$ who asked you to help him repay his life-debt by preventing $npc:23090005$'s reawakening. $npcName:11000144$'s willingness to put his life on the line to keep his promise is inspiring
You should help $npc:11000144$ defeat the monsters of $map:02000268$ and locate$item:30000157$ to defy what was prophesied. Once you have found it, bring it to $npc:11001046$ at $map:02000268$ to learn how to stop the $npc:23090005$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters in $map:02000268$ and find the $item:30000157$

quest.name: The Blade of a Hero
quest.desc:
After transforming the $item:30000157$ back into the $item:13200028$ and packing it in the $item:30000155$, $npcName:11001046$ asked you to deliver it to $npcName:11000144$.
He also had another request: for you to tell $npcName:11000144$ that $item:13200028$ can be restored to its true power by. All he needs to do is find the $item:30000153$ below the stone grave markers where the nameless heroes rest, then to use the Cleansing Flames to transform it into the $item:30000154$, and place within the $item:13200028$.
You should hurry over to $map:02000173$ and let $npc:11000144$ know before you forget.

quest.name: The $item:30000153$
quest.desc:
Find the $item:30000153$, which contains the souls of the heroes who sealed away the $npc:23090005$ within $map:02000200$.
Once you've done that, cast it into the $npc:11000345$.
quest.manual: Search the stone grave markers in $map:02000200$ and locate the $item:30000153$

quest.name: Wake the Dead
quest.desc:
Onward to the $map:02000200$! You must cast the $item:30000153$ into the $npc:11000345$ at the end of the path!
If what you've been told is true, that will awaken the soul within the $item:30000153$ and cause it to transform into the $item:30000154$.
Once you have obtained the $item:30000154$ take it to $npc:11000144$ and instruct him to embed it within the $item:13200028$.

quest.name: Mechanical Monsters: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
You agreed to analyze the battle tactics and capabilities of machine monsters. As there are said to be a large number in $map:2000270$, that seems like an excellent place to begin your research.
quest.manual: Battle Machine monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Invasive Insectoids: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Although insect monsters are found all across the world, it's said that there is an especially high number of them in the areas around $map:2000023$. That should be a good place to start your research.
quest.manual: Battle insect monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Inanimate Monsters: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Although inanimate monsters can be found around the world, they are said to be plentiful around areas that have been transformed into Ludibrium blocks. You should search such locations for monsters to battle and analyze.
quest.manual: Battle inanimate monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Perilous Plants: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Seeing as plant monsters can be found nearly anywhere, you can challenge them wherever you like, and study their tactics.
quest.manual: Battle plant monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Divine Beasts: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Divine monsters may be rare, but you don't give up easy. Locate and defeat divine monsters, and share what you learn in the process!
quest.manual: Battle divine monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Devilish Dangers: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Devil monsters are usually found in the Land of Darkness, but they can also be found in other parts of Maple World touched by shadow. Defeat devil monsters and record your findings!
quest.manual: Battle devil monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Barbarous Beasts: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Considering how beast monsters can be found nearly anywhere, you can challenge them wherever you like, and study their tactics.
quest.manual: Battle beast monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Understanding the Undead: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Undead monsters are known to dwell in dark places like the Ant Tunnel or the Land of Darkness. Those places seem as good as any to start your monster research.
quest.manual: Battle undead monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Fiendish Fairies: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
It's said that fairy monsters can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000076$ and $map:2000023$. You should pick one and begin your monster research.
quest.manual: Battle fairy monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Horrible Humanoids: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
It's said that humanoid foes can be found in the areas around $map:2000100$. You should start your investigative hunt there!
quest.manual: Battle humanoid foes to learn more about them

quest.name: Spiteful Spirits: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Spirit monsters can be found all over the place. Find some to battle, and document your findings!
quest.manual: Battle spirit monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Barrels of Fun
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate if Flaming Barrels can be effectively used as weapons. You should be able to find some in the areas surrounding $map:2000270$.
Go find out how useful they are by throwing them at enemies!

quest.name: Cartloads of Chaos
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether mine carts can be effectively used as weapons. Mine carts can be found near the Ant Tunnels or inside abandoned mines.
Go find out how useful they are by throwing them at enemies!
quest.manual: Attack enemies with rolling mine carts

quest.name: Booming Barrels
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether explosives barrels can be effectively used as weapons. Explosives barrels can be found within the Ant Tunnels or near pirate-infested beaches.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Terrible Tires
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether tires can be effectively used as weapons. Tires can be found in the areas around $map:02000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Trash Can Smackdown
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether trash cans can be effectively used as weapons. Trash cans can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000270$ and $map:02000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Gas Tank Takedown
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether gas tanks can be effectively used as weapons. Gas tanks can be found in the research centers near $map:02000270$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Toxic Waste Tossup
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether toxic waste drums can be effectively used as weapons. Toxic waste drums can be found in the research centers near $map:02000270$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Throw toxic waste drums at enemies

quest.name: Totem Toss
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Fire Totems can be effectively used as weapons. Fire Totems can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Poison Bag Beatdown
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether poison bags can be effectively used as weapons. Poison bags can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Deadly Dynamite Carts
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether dynamite carts can be effectively used as weapons. Dynamite carts can be found near quarries.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Explosive Bomb Blowout
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate how powerful of a weapon Bombs can be. Discarded bombs can be found within caves like the abandoned mines or the Ant Tunnels.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Chicken Coop Crash
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether chicken coops can be effectively used as weapons. Chicken coops can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000076$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Drive-by Egging
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether eggs can be effectively used as weapons. Unattended eggs can be found near places with avian monsters.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Bottle Crate Catastrophe
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether boxes of bottles can be effectively used as weapons. Boxes of bottles can be found at research labs.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Attack by throwing a crate of bottles

quest.name: Torch It
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether torches can be effectively used as weapons. Torches can be found in caves or in areas surrounding $map:02000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Rainbow Poo Panic
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether rainbow poop trees can be effectively used as weapons. Rainbow poop trees can be found in green pastures on bright sunny days.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Strike enemies using rainbow poop trees

quest.name: Rotten Poo Peril
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether rotted rainbow poop trees can be effectively used as weapons. Rotted rainbow poop trees can be found in green pastures on bright sunny days.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Strike enemies using rotted rainbow poop trees

quest.name: Runaway Road Signs
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether road signs can be effectively used as weapons. Road signs can be found on the sides of roads.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Stoplight Shellacking
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether stoplights can be effectively used as weapons. Stoplights can be found on the sides of roads in areas surrounding $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Telephone Pole Terror
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether telephone poles can be effectively used as weapons. Telephone poles can be found on the sides of roads in areas surrounding $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Totemic Trouncing
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ said that tall totems can become useful weapons when swung with a great force. The tall totems can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Snap, Crackle, Pipe
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ said that pipes can become useful weapons when swung with a great force. The pipes can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000270$ and $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Perion House Hammering
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ said that Perion houses can become useful weapons when slammed down with a great force. Perion houses can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Kerning Bus Bash
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Kerning buses can be effectively used as weapons. Decommissioned Kerning buses can be found on the sides of asphalt roads.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Phone Booth Barrage
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Kerning phone booths can be effectively used as weapons. Kerning phone booths can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000270$, and those north of $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Smack enemies with Kerning phone booths

quest.name: Kerning Truck Tumult
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Kerning trucks can be effectively used as weapons. Kerning trucks can be found near the sides of asphalt roads.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Igloo, Interrupted
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether igloos can be effectively used as weapons. Igloos can be found in frozen areas.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Shower Stall Smash
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether shower stalls can be effectively used as weapons.
Public shower stalls are said to be found in random locations. You'll have to track them down before you can determine whether they are an effective weapon.

quest.name: Portable Toilet Travesty
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether portable toilets can be effectively used as weapons.
Portable toilets are said to be found in random locations. You'll have to track them down before you can determine whether they are an effective weapon.

quest.name: Electric EMP Bombshells
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate how powerful of a weapon EMP Bombs can be. They are said to be found within laboratories and factories.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Clanking Clockwork Bombs
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate how powerful of a weapon Wind-Up Bombs can be. They are said to be found in the areas north of $map:2000100$, where Ludibrium's influence has spread.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Notorious Monsters: Fragmented Soul
quest.desc:
Overwhelmed with the monumental task of documenting every monster in Maple World in a single compendium, $npcName:11001179$ has decided to publish a small digest containing only the most notorious and powerful adversaries.
Having heard from a traveler about the powerful entity known as $npc:22000045$, $npcName:11001179$ has tasked you with identifying your new target's strengths and weaknesses. With your aid, this booklet is bound to be a best-seller! Defeat $npc:22000045$ at $map:02000262$, and report back with everything you learn!
